/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. A few cars and buses can be seen traversing the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds visible in the distance. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
